venue.address_2: Look for Boat Launch sign on left
venue.name: Pawtuckaway Lake Fundy Cove Launch

item.description:
We will be paddling on Pawtuckaway Lake in the afternoon on Easter Sunday meeting at the Fundy Cove Boat Launch. Open to all kayak types as well as canoes.

Directions: Take Rt. 156 to Deerfield Rd. Nottingham NH. Look for Boat Ramp sign on right then turn onto road on left across from sign. The address in the link below is an approximation.

http://maps.google.co...

The water temp is still very cold so a wet suit "farmer john/jane" is highly recommended to be safe in the water this time of year. The air temp is expected to reach 70 degrees and we will be staying closer to shore. Bring extra clothing/towel though if you do decide to take a dip. Also sunblock and, believe it or not, bug spray is a good idea.
item.name: Easter Sunday Paddle on Pawtuckaway Lake from Fundy Cove Boat Launch
